Package io.github.djtpj.trait.traits

Class CooldownAbility

java.lang.Object
io.github.djtpj.trait.Trait
io.github.djtpj.trait.Ability
io.github.djtpj.trait.traits.CooldownAbility
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.bukkit.event.Listener
Direct Known Subclasses:
Intangibility, SpatialJumper
public abstract class CooldownAbility extends Ability
A CooldownAbility is an Ability that provides the tools to program in a cooldown.
